title: Adam 12 1968 Seasons 1 - 4
description:
Adam 12 1968 Seasons 1 - 4

Vintage cop episodes from the good old days. Any man will drool over all the loving shots of now vanished automobile models. Ah, remember when you could buy a VW Camper Van for $800 ?


A realistic police drama following the lives of two officers of the LAPD, veteran Pete Malloy and his rookie partner, Jim Reed. Done in a spare, almost "docudrama" style, each episode covered a variety of incidents that the officers encountered during a shift, from the tragic to the trivial. 




NOTE: for some reason I could not get these episodes to play on mobile players, but they play great on my computer with VLC. I have no idea
